quests.name: Rain Dancer
quests.description: Find a rainy spot and dance in the rain! The badge will detect high humidity levels.
quests.hint: Look for areas with visible rain or high moisture in the air.

quests.name: Cold Explorer
quests.description: Find a cold location where temperature drops below 15Â°C.
quests.hint: Try air-conditioned rooms or shaded outdoor areas.

quests.name: Shadow Hunter
quests.description: Find a dark or covered area. The badge detects this through temperature and humidity changes.
quests.hint: Look for areas with sudden temperature drops and humidity increases.

quests.name: Smoke Detective
quests.description: Detect cigarette smoke in the air.
quests.hint: Look for designated smoking areas or people smoking cigarettes.

quests.name: Herbal Detective
quests.description: Detect unique herbal smoke signatures in the air.
quests.hint: Follow your nose to find distinctive herbal smoke patterns.

quests.name: Shake It Off
quests.description: Shake your badge vigorously 5 times. The motion sensor will detect this.
quests.hint: Hold the badge firmly and shake it up and down or side to side.

quests.name: Tilt Master
quests.description: Tilt your badge at different angles 3 times.
quests.hint: Rotate and tilt the badge in different directions.

quests.name: Badge Network
quests.description: Find another badge nearby via LoRa communication.
quests.hint: Look for other WHY2025 badge holders within 100 meters.

quests.name: Environmental Explorer
quests.hint: Complete Rain Dancer, Cold Explorer, and Shadow Hunter quests.
